com.mapbox.services.android.geocoder.ui

Class GeocoderAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • BaseAdapter
      • com.mapbox.services.android.geocoder.ui.GeocoderAdapter

  • public class GeocoderAdapter
extends BaseAdapter
    Adapter for the GeocoderAutoCompleteView. In this class we make the Mapbox Geocoding API call.
    Since:
    1.0.0

        Since:

        See Also:
        Mapbox access token

        Since:
        1.0.0
        See Also:

      • getCountry

        public java.lang.String getCountry()
        Get the country you are limiting your geocoding results if applicable.
        Returns:
        ISO 3166 alpha 2 country code
        Since:
        1.3.0

      • setCountry

        public void setCountry(java.lang.String country)
        Parameter limits results to a set of one or more countries, specified with ISO 3166 alpha 2 country codes and separated by commas.
        Parameters:
        country - String matching country code.
        Since:
        1.3.0

      • getType

        public java.lang.String getType()
        Get the geocoder filter type.
        Returns:
        String containing "place", "poi", "neighborhood", etc.
        Since:
        1.0.0
        See Also:
        Geocoding API documentation

      • setType

        public void setType(java.lang.String type)
        Configure the geocoder type, pass in one of the constants found within GeocodingCriteria.
        Parameters:
        type - String containing "place", "poi", "neighborhood", etc.
        Since:
        1.0.0
        See Also:
        Geocoding API documentation

      • getBbox

        public double[] getBbox()
        Bounding box within which to limit results
        Returns:
        double array containing minX, minY, maxX, maxY

      • setBbox

        public void setBbox(com.mapbox.services.commons.models.Position northeast,
                    com.mapbox.services.commons.models.Position southwest)
        Bounding box within which to limit results.
        Parameters:
        northeast - The top right hand corner of your bounding box when the map is pointed north.
        southwest - The bottom left hand corner of your bounding box when the map is pointed north.
        Since:
        1.3.0

      • setBbox

        public void setBbox(double minX,
                    double minY,
                    double maxX,
                    double maxY)
        Bounding box within which to limit results.
        Parameters:
        minX - Bottom of bounding box when map is pointed north.
        minY - Left of bounding box when map is pointed north.
        maxX - Top of bounding box when map is pointed north.
        maxY - Right of bounding box when map is pointed north.
        Since:
        1.3.0

      • getView

        public View getView(int position,
                    View convertView,
                    ViewGroup parent)
        Get a View that displays the data at the specified position in the data set.
        Parameters:
        position - The position of the item within the adapter's data set of the item whose view we want.
        convertView - The old view to reuse, if possible.
        parent - The parent that this view will eventually be attached to.
        Returns:
        A View corresponding to the data at the specified position.
        Since:
        1.0.0
        See Also:
        Android Adapter
